amendment.description: To make available from amounts available for Operation and Maintenance, Navy, $2,000,000 for night vision goggles in advanced helicopter training.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1238 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1238 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S9366; text: CR S9366) To make available from amounts available for Operation and Maintenance, Navy, $2,000,000 for night vision goggles in advanced helicopter training.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1238 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1238 proposed by Senator Inouye for Senator Graham FL.
